document.full_text: the spirit of red rum lived on at aintree on saturday when trainer donald mccain followed his father ginger into grand national folklore by winning the world famous steeplechase with ballabriggs.
document.title: mccain secures emotional national triumph
lines_and_colors: the spirit of red rum lived on at aintree on saturday when trainer donald mccain followed his father ginger into grand national folklore by winning the world famous steeplechase with ballabriggs.
